e.� ! Do you want to get us burned to a crisp!?
1�...Or are you saying that because you <gasp> left it back in Adoulin?
1�Did you leave it behind?Yes, silly me.No, I've got it right here.
1�How could you!?

n.�Hmmm... Ortharsssyne and 6����...
1�You mean to tell me that you are not like the rest of those pillagers, but ssstaunch believers in August and his desire to preserve the forest?
1�You refer to the founder king by his first name? So...you knew him personally?
1�But he lived centuries upon centuries ago! You couldn't possibly--
1�Of courssse I knew him, for I am Sajj'aka.
1�Not only did I know the first Adoulin king, I ssswore my allegiance to him.
1�Was it centuries ago? Millennia? Time flows for many thingsss, but upon Sajj'aka it touchesss not.
1�Seasss change. Landsss change. Even should the starsss fade from existence, the covenant made with Augussst shall not break.
1�In my eyes, the lives of your kind are as delicate and transient as bubbles in a ssstream, your moments of glory mere sssparks from flint.
1�Inconsssequential, insssignificant, insssubstantial--such is how I came to conceive of your peoples.
1�Augussst has been the only exception.
1�His aura shone brighter than my refulgent scales, and his resolve was ssstrong enough to wrest me from the realm of shadows.
1�That is not the lone justification for why my memory of him will persissst until the end of time, but it is an important one.
1�And what of you, ssspindly-legged foal?
1�Does the ressspect for the king you claim to harbor within that miniscule bosom of yours amount to even a drop in the sea compared to what I showed him while he was alive?
1�<Snort>Hopefully you can at least answer this sssimple question.
1�As a preface...you are aware of the ssseven guardians that protect the Ulbukan hinterland, are you not?
1�Yes, I am. They're the Naakuals, right?
1�Is that the ephemeral sssobriquet they have been given by your kind? Very well.
1�I shall not waste my breath explaining the ressst.
1�However, there was one more guardian who fought alongside August...a worthy tiger whose fur shone a lussstrous gold.
1�That must be Terrcualn.
1�I recall reading about him during one of my trips to the library. What was the title of the book, though...?
1�Aha, ��His Majesty and the Golden Beast��! That's it!
1�Ah, booksss. An inconvenient form of immortality, but perhapsss the best your ephemeral kind can hope for. If you are truly learned, you should have no qualms about a simple tessst.
1�Pray tell me, where did August meet Terrcualn in combat?
1�Umm... Where they fought, you say? Well...that would be...
1�I know not why you tressspassed upon this land, and I no longer care.

1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Would you like to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?None, thank you.(1).(2).(3).(4).(5).11(1)11(2)11(3)
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1� , if you would... Please show His Eminence the item you found in 8����.

1�8����? I have not heard of such a place. Let me sssee...
1�Hmm... Yesss, I can sense Siren's presence emanating from this bell...
1�However, she seems to have lost her power and is immersed in a deep ssslumber.
1�A deep slumber?
1�So if she were to regain her power, she would wake up eventually!?
1�Do not be so hasssty, Princess. Even with my great wisdom, I am uncertain how to go about such a matter...
1�However, it is clear that we must focusss on how to restore her power before we can proceed any further.
1�Yes, I suppose you are right.
1�Although, how can we do that, I wonder...
1�Hm? S-sweets, you say?
1�They'd make me feel better, but I'm not so sure about this particular situation...
1�H-hey! Where did you get that!?
1�That has nothing to do with Siren!
1�Is that... Is that a leaf from my brother?
1�I don't think that has anything to do with Siren...
1�The lifestream... In other words, you're saying that if we can borrow the power of ergon loci, we might be able to use it to restore Siren's power...
1�And if Siren regains her power and is able to wake up...
1�I forgot something important!
1�If Siren wakes up, do you think she'll even listen to what we have to say?
1�I mean, she is a powerful being who is able to control all of nature...
1�I highly doubt offering Siren sweets will convince her to help us.
1�It's not like they'd convince me to listen to you either!
1�H-hey, I mean it!
1�This is no time for jokes,  . Try to be serious for a change.
1� , I don't think that's going to get us anywhere.
1�The Communion!
1�That reminds me of something Lhaiso once said...
1�Long ago, distinguished geomancers used the Communion to speak with nature and prime avatars...
1�If so, we could ask either Lhaiso or Ikhi for help...
1�The Communion... A Communion is a pact with nature.

1�Your will of how things should be...
1�In that case, does that mean that I can use the lifestream as well?
1�Arciela, do you remember when you were anointed as the leader of the Order of Adoulin?
1�You made a declaration in front of the leaders of the various orders assembled before you.
1�Just like then, why don't you simply tell the prime avatar what you are thinking and what you hope to accomplish?
1�So I should simply tell her what I said back then...
1�I think I can do that!
1�Although, if there is even a tiny bit of reluctance on your part, it will undoubtedly show through as well.
1�In other words, you're saying I need to be strong and have conviction.
1�Beyond that, I sssuppose the rest is up to you.
1�Yes, we are at a loss for any other possible avenues of pursuit.
1�Now then, I shall go to the ergon locus locations around Adoulin and gather the power of the lifestream.
1�I'm counting on your assistance, Darrcuiln.
1�(You can count on me.)
